DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the dose response of entecavir in Japanese patients as measured by HBV DNA levels by PCR (log10 copies/mL) at Week 22
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Dose Response Study in Japan in Chronic Hepatitis B
DOC.criteria: Positive for HBsAg OR, negative for IgM core antibody and confirmation of chronic hepatitis B on liver biopsy, Positive for HBeAg OR negative for HBeAg with positive HBeAb, Documented HBV Viremia on 2 or more occasions: Viremia on sample drawn AND HBV DNA of â‰¥ 40 MEq/mL by Quantiplex assay at the screening visit
